ipchecker
---------

## Install

```bash
$ npm install --save ipchecker
```

## Example

```javascript
var ipchecker = require('ipchecker');
var check = ipchecker.create(['192.168.*.*', '127.0.0.1']);

check('192.168.0.1');
```
